Room.Name: Oceancrest Circle
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the western rim of the magnificent Oceancrest Circle.
Room.LongDescription: Walking around the Circle, you see that it is not just a dirt path, like most of the other roads, but is finely decorated with ornate bricks and cement. Although there are a few paved roads in town, it is not common to see such fancy artwork that people can step on.
